title: LNG Tank Foundation & Structural Siting Basis
description: Establishes the structural, geotechnical, and foundation design basis for LNG tank siting using API 620/625, NFPA 59A, and site-specific geotechnical constraints. Covers soil conditions, frost depth, seismic considerations, settlement, and integration with tank geometry and site layout.
